params._collateral: The amount of peg collateral tokens to be deposited
params._recipient: The address of the recipient to receive the newly minted fixed rate synthetic tokens

returns.amountTokens: The amount of newly minted fixed rate synthetic tokens

wrap(uint256,address).notice: This function is used to mint new fixed rate synthetic tokens by depositing peg collateral tokensThe conversion is based on a fixed rate
